attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Consider the correctness of allowing 'gay' couples to aopt inocent children and instill in those children their own social values. Children are conceived, born and nurished by male/female couples. This is nature's way for all living creatures. We have NO right to alter that way. Do you have that right ?????????????????

Please note: you have not created a category that encompasses my comments!

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence from "John Bartlett" to an action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
